name: Zumba
description: Zumba is an exercise fitness activity based on the rhythms of Latin dance music-- salsa, reggaetón, merengue and cumbia Dance with Zumba in the Parks! There is now a minimal fee for Indoor Zumba. Visit sfrecpark.org/zumba for a full list of current class information. Purchase a discounted multi-visit pass at sfrecpark.org/register. Please go to the auditorium at the activity start time.
fullDescription: Zumba is an exercise fitness activity based on the rhythms of Latin dance music-- salsa, reggaetón, merengue and cumbia Dance with Zumba in the Parks! There is now a minimal fee for Indoor Zumba. Visit sfrecpark.org/zumba for a full list of current class information. Purchase a discounted multi-visit pass at sfrecpark.org/register. Please go to the auditorium at the activity start time.
whatTheyOffer: Zumba is an exercise fitness activity based on the rhythms of Latin dance music-- salsa, reggaetón, merengue and cumbia Dance with Zumba in the Parks! There is now a minimal fee for Indoor Zumba. Visit sfrecpark.org/zumba for a full list of current class information. Purchase a discounted multi-visit pass at sfrecpark.org/register. Please go to the auditorium at the activity start time.
howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register, or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
keywords: i am between 18 and 24 years old.
